info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:45PM EDT until August 03 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN OAKLAND AND SOUTHERN MACOMB COUNTIES... At 644 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Clair Shores, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... St. Clair Shores and Mount Clemens around 655 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Orchard Lake, Roseville, Shelby Township, Commerce, Utica, Lathrup Village, Bingham Farms and Farmington Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
